name: Humpty Dumpty Sat On A Unicycle
name_original: Humpty Dumpty Sat On A Unicycle
description:
Humpty Dumpty once again finds himself in a precarious situation! Maneuver his unicycle to avoid soaring bricks, frying pans, and comets. 

Controls

Move your mouse left and right to guide the wheel of the unicycle. The wheel follows the direction of the mouse. Play in fullscreen.

Credits

Egg crack (snippet) https://freesound.org/people/rickaldo09/sounds/327631/
